1.title: Waking the Curse

episode of.title: Curse of the Frozen Gold (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: In the treacherous wilds of British Columbia, six prospectors pursue a cursed cache of gold worth billions. With just a few short weeks to complete their mission, they'll combine their skills to find the fortune, or fall victim to the curse.

2.title: Aliens on Terrarosa

episode of.title: Curse of the Frozen Gold (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Adam and Evan take on the Terrarosa Glacier, and a mysterious force that nearly killed a local prospector. Daryl takes Danny into Spindle Canyon, uncovering the ghostly remnants of past explorers along with promising signs of gold.

3.title: Ghosts from the Past

episode of.title: Curse of the Frozen Gold (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: The ghosts of past prospectors haunt the team, and mysterious clues divide opinions as the group searches and struggles to find the exact location of Slumach's gold.

4.title: Weathering the Storm

episode of.title: Curse of the Frozen Gold (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: A mysterious map marked with dollar signs points the team towards another potential location. A startling discovery throws the team in disarray, exposing hidden fractures as the first real rains of the season set in.

5.title: Secrets Revealed

episode of.title: Curse of the Frozen Gold (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Daryl's got new info about gold on the Terrarosa Glacier, but he'll only reveal it if he can tag along with Adam and Evan. Fred gets a mysterious call from a prospector who says he's found Slumach's gold and sets out with Don and Danny.

6.title: On the Brink

episode of.title: Curse of the Frozen Gold (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Time's up, and it's a frantic race to find the gold. The team is at a crossroads when Adam drops a bomb that divides opinions. It's a final grasp at gold and glory before winter bears down and they're frozen out.

imdb.plot outline: Allegedly worth billions, 'Slumach's Gold' has tantalized prospectors for over a century, and now a team of experienced gold hunters takes up the hunt - and the curse that goes with it. They're an odd mix - young and fit mountain climbers, a gold-obsessed prospector, a local outdoorsman, and some savvy, but skeptical old-timers. They only have three months to explore the vast and rugged wilderness of Pitt Lake before winter weather sets in. So they quickly determine which six locations hold the most promise, and set off to investigate two of them: one backed by First Nations oral history, the other a secret location that might be linked to a fabled prospector's letter. Working together for the first time, the group starts to realize what they're up against - danger-filled locations, unreliable leads, not enough time, and delusional over-enthusiasm fuelled by gold fever. They set off on a challenging treasure hunt in the BC mountains - but when fights break out, they wonder if the team will even last the summer.
imdb.title: Curse of the Frozen Gold
plot: Allegedly worth billions, 'Slumach's Gold' has tantalized prospectors for over a century, and now a team of experienced gold hunters takes up the hunt - and the curse that goes with it. They're an odd mix - young and fit mountain climbers, a gold-obsessed prospector, a local outdoorsman, and some savvy, but skeptical old-timers. They only have three months to explore the vast and rugged wilderness of Pitt Lake before winter weather sets in. So they quickly determine which six locations hold the most promise, and set off to investigate two of them: one backed by First Nations oral history, the other a secret location that might be linked to a fabled prospector's letter. Working together for the first time, the group starts to realize what they're up against - danger-filled locations, unreliable leads, not enough time, and delusional over-enthusiasm fuelled by gold fever. They set off on a challenging treasure hunt in the BC mountains - but when fights break out, they wonder if the team will even last the summer.
